text: the worst place for delivery they sed it will be one hour and nothing for hour and half . I called and they sed it will be another 15 min so that means they didn't do my order thanks for nothing.
This hidden gem has to be if not the best Chinese food in Calgary. Always fresh and consistent!
It's pretty good. Close to home. The owners are very friendly. Black pepper beef is my fav.
Definitely one of my favourite Chinese food restaurants in Calgary! The food is always fresh and always tastes amazing. Highly recommended if you live in the NE!
